code: import React,{useContext,useState}from"react";import{Panel}from"primereact/panel";import{DataTable}from"primereact/datatable";import{Column}from"primereact/column";import{Button}from"primereact/button";import{ProductContext}from"../contexts/ProductContext";import ProductForm from"./ProductForm";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductList=()=>{const{products,findProduct}=useContext(ProductContext);const[isVisible,setIsVisible]=useState(false);const saveProduct=id=>{findProduct(id);setIsVisible(true);};const footer=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-clearfix",style:{width:"100%"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{style:{float:"left"},icon:"pi pi-plus",label:"Add",onClick:()=>setIsVisible(true)})});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Panel,{header:"LISTA DE PRODUCTOS",style:{textAlign:"center"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DataTable,{value:products,selectionMode:"single",onSelectionChange:e=>saveProduct(e.value._id),footer:footer,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Column,{field:"_id",header:"Id"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Column,{field:"productName",header:"Nombre"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Column,{field:"price",header:"Precio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Column,{field:"expiryDate",header:"Fecha de Caducidad"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductForm,{isVisible:isVisible,setIsVisible:setIsVisible})]});};export default ProductList;
